properties.name: sourceRun
properties.description: path to the poten source run for *.p2f which must be used instead of running poten, in case runFlag==0.

properties.name: iRad
properties.description: -1: do not solve radiation problem, 0: solve radiation only for the specified modes, 1: solve radiation for all modes.

properties.name: iDiff
properties.description: -1: do not solve diffraction problem, 0: solve diffraction only for the specified modes, 1: solve diffraction for all modes.

properties.name: iModes
properties.description: an array of mode flags, 0:do not include, 1:include the mode. The included modes will be solved if idiff=0 or irad=0.
